thread.title: NOPE, THE TP IN THIS PHOTO WAS NOT HANDPHONE DRIVING
thread.title_full: NOPE, THE TP IN THIS PHOTO WAS NOT HANDPHONE DRIVING

author: farhan
title: NOPE, THE TP IN THIS PHOTO WAS NOT HANDPHONE DRIVING
text:
NOPE, THE TP IN THIS PHOTO WAS NOT HANDPHONE DRIVING   Tue, 07/02/2017 - 10:03am Advertisement 
Our readers have contributed this viral photo of a traffic police officer holding a mobile phone at a traffic light junction. 
"Is this an offence? Is this considered handphone driving?" 
According to the Traffic Police, handphone driving occurs when these 3 conditions are in place: (a) the vehicle is in motion; and (b) the driver is holding on to the handphone with one hand; and (c) the driver is communicating with any person with that handphone. 
That means, the officer was not handphone driving. Source:
